metadata.title: CVE-2024-50209 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/bnxt_re: Add a check for memory allocation__alloc_pbl() can return error when memory allocation fails.Driver is not checking the status on one of the instances.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
